[[Mike Hannigan]] (stepson-in-law) | image = [[Image:Frank's_second_wife.jpg‎]] }} '''Mrs. Buffay''' is [[Frank Buffay Sr.]]'s second wife after he walked out on his first wife, [[Lily Buffay|Lily]], and his two twin daughters, [[Ursula Buffay|Ursula]] and [[Phoebe Buffay]]. Together she and Frank Sr. have a son, [[Frank Buffay Jr.]] She was portrayed by [[Laraine Newman]]. The first time Phoebe goes to her father's house, she backs out as she's not ready to meet her father. The second time, she ends up hitting Mrs. Buffay's dog, [[Schnoodle]], when she starts [[Frances|her grandmother]]'s cab so she has to take the dog to the vet for stitches. She visits for a third time and brings Schnoodle back, and she sees Mrs. Buffay and her half-brother, Frank Jr., for the first time. When Phoebe asks to see Frank Sr, Mrs. Buffay tells her that Frank went out for groceries four years ago and has never returned. ==Appearances== * "[[The One With The Bullies]]" (First appearance) [[Category:Season 2 Characters]] [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Phoebe's Family]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Grandmothers]] [[Category:Characters]]
